Song.title: You Are All I Need (Jenna Cottrell)

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: My [G]Lord, how l[D]ong, my L[C]ord, how l[G]ong Must [C]I this [C/D]trial end[G]ure? I [C]am so weak, so n[G]eedy, God My s[Am7]oul and mind im[D]pure.
Chorus 1: For[C]give me Lord, I p[G]ray. I h[C]ave not sought your f[G]ace I [C]long for p[D]eace Oh [Em]make me [G/D]see That [C]You are [C/D]all I n[G]eed.
Verse 2: I [G]wait on [D]you, I [C]wait on [G]you, Un[C]til you [C/D]show the [G]way. Be [C]faithful to your [G]holy word, Pour [Am7]out your sovereign [D]grace.
{new_page} Verse 3: Lift [G]up my [D]eyes, Lift [C]up my [G]eyes, To [C]see your [C/D]will for [G]me Be [C]ever present, [G]ever near I [Am7]will trust and bel[D]ieve.
Chorus 2: For[C]give me Lord, I p[G]ray. Oh, [C]help me seek your [G]face I [C]long for p[D]eace Oh [Em]make me [G/D]see That [C]You are [C/D]all I n[G]eed. Jesus, [C]You are [C/D]all I n[G]eed.
Bridge: Holy [C]Spirit, melt me, [G/Em]break my h[D]eart [C]Open my eyes to [G/Em]who you [D]are. [(Back to Chorus 2)]
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 my lord how long my lord how long must i this trial endure i am so weak so needy god my soul and mind impure chorus 1 forgive me lord i pray i have not sought your face i long for peace oh make me see that you are all i need verse 2 i wait on you i wait on you until you show the way be faithful to your holy word pour out your sovereign grace verse 3 lift up my eyes lift up my eyes to see your will for me be ever present ever near i will trust and believe chorus 2 forgive me lord i pray oh help me seek your face i long for peace oh make me see that you are all i need jesus you are all i need bridge holy spirit melt me break my heart open my eyes to who you are
